oai_dc:dc.dc:title: ROTC visit with Homer Pittard
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Written on the back: "I hit the target with a recoiler rifle at 3000 yards as Dr. Pittard looks on at Fort Benning, ROTC visit in July 1963"
